name: Trials Impending
description:
The air has changed, something is different. Adventure await at your door step. You will face challenges and trails. In doing so you will help those around you heal from trials they have gone through. In the end will it be worth it, or will you be trapped in another challenge?

This is a IGMC2017 entry.

Credits to:

JStewartMusic Simple Town Theme and Island Theme
